name: flakrat-repo_centos
summary: Configures the CentOS 5 or 6 Yum repository config to point to a local mirror
author: flakrat
description:
Manage the CentOS repositories on CentOS clients (currently supports releases 5 and 6).

Originally based off of http://github.com/stahnma/puppet-module-puppetlabs_yum
